label: welcome
title: Short Stories the fun way
author: Jeff Bartenbach
shortbody: Pointed Stories is a new way to enjoy short stories. It’s quite simply a feed of the best stories, from the classics to contemporary writers.
longbody: Pointed Stories is a new way to enjoy short stories. It’s quite simply a feed of the best stories, from the classics to contemporary writers.
